item.title: Spring
item.description: http://dolszewski.com/spring/how-to-bind-requestparam-to-object/ To enable details in health API management.endpoint.health.show-details=always To switch profile Via command line --spring.profiles.active=dev Via environment variable spring_profiles_active=dev
